info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 7:23PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Abbeville and southern Greenwood Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 723 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southeast of Abbeville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenwood, Abbeville, Ninety Six, Troy, Ninety Six Historic Site, Lake Greenwood, Promised Land, Bradley, Callison and Epworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
